FuncDef: The display sflow packet statistics command displays statistics about sFlow packets sent on a specified interface or sFlow packets sent and received on a specified board.
CLIs: display sflow packet statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies an interface type and number.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display sflow packet statistics interface gigabitEthernet 1/0/1 slot 1
sFlow sample send info based on interface:
sFlow sample send info based on slot:
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To display statistics about sFlow packets sent on a specified interface or sFlow packets sent and received on a specified board, run the display sflow packet statistics command.
